required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Fosrenol Post-marketing Surveillance for Hemodialysis in Japan
clinical_study.official_title: Special Drug Use Investigation of Fosrenol (Long-term Investigation for Patients With Hemodialysis)

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a regulatory post marketing surveillance in Japan, and it is a local prospective and observational study of patients in hemodialysis who received Fosrenol for hyperphosphatemia. The objective of this study is to assess safety and efficacy of using Fosrenol in clinical practice. A total 3,000 patients will be recruited and followed 5 years.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse drug reactions in subjects who received Fosrenol
primary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 5 years

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of serious adverse events in subjects who received Fosrenol
primary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 5 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse drug reactions in subpopulation with baseline data [such as demographic data, concomitant disease, duration of treatment, maximum daily dose] and dose of Fosrenol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 5 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Effectiveness evaluation assessment [achievement rate of a goal phosphate level; 3.5-6 mg/dL]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 5 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Effectiveness evaluation assessment [achievement rate of a goal calcium level; 8.4-10.0 mg/dL]
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 5 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical test value collection: calciotropic hormones
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 5 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical test value collection: bone turnover markers
secondary_outcome.time_frame: After Fosrenol administration, up to 5 years

intervention.description: Patients in hemodialysis who have received Fosrenol for hyperphosphatemia.

study_pop.textblock: The target population of this study is patients who have received a prescription of Fosrenol on the basis of the decision of the physician. The study is expected to collect data of 3,000 patients in about 300 practices in Japan.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients undergoing hemodialysis who received Fosrenol for hyperphosphatemia
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who are contraindicated based on the product label

Click here and search for information on any recalls, market or product safety alerts by the FDA which might have occurred with this product.
